versions.description: ROS 2 Humble Hawksbill - Long-term support distribution (from source)
build_commands: if [ -n "$VIRTUAL_ENV" ]; then python3 -m pip install vcstool colcon-common-extensions rosdep; else python3 -m pip install --user vcstool colcon-common-extensions rosdep; fi

if [ ! -f $HOME/.ros/rosdep/sources.list.d/20-default.list ] && [ ! -f /etc/ros/rosdep/sources.list.d/20-default.list ]; then echo 'yaml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ros/rosdistro/master/rosdep/base.yaml' > $HOME/.ros/rosdep/sources.list.d/20-default.list && echo 'yaml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ros/rosdistro/master/rosdep/python.yaml' >> $HOME/.ros/rosdep/sources.list.d/20-default.list && echo 'yaml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ros/rosdistro/master/rosdep/ruby.yaml' >> $HOME/.ros/rosdep/sources.list.d/20-default.list; fi
